meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Ghana.
meanings.sent1: In Ghana, you can buy many things with just one pesewa.
meanings.sent2: I found a pesewa on the ground while walking to the market.
meanings.sent3: The pesewa rolled away, trying to escape from the other coins.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a shiny pesewa, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The pesewa jingled in his pocket, a reminder of his visit to Ghana.

meanings.definition: A coin worth one hundredth of a Ghanaian cedi.
meanings.sent1: She saved every pesewa she earned to buy a special gift.
meanings.sent2: The street vendor handed me a pesewa in change for my purchase.
meanings.sent3: The pesewa in his hand seemed to whisper, 'Spend me wisely.'
meanings.sent4: The pesewa glinted in the sunlight, a tiny treasure in her palm.
meanings.sent5: He tossed the pesewa into the fountain, making a wish for good luck.
